master.heading: Music & Drama Education Expo 2019
master.content:
As part of the celebrations, across each of the three nights 
                    we welcome a different massed ensemble performance project from 
                    across the country .The three Massed Ensembles for the Music for 
                    Youth Proms 2018 will join us from different regions of the UK 
                    and each offer a wider group of young people an opportunity to take 
                    part in a large scale project, sho…read more
